name: historical_rates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool exchanger_currency_rates_provider.
Tool description: Get hourly updated rates for more than 150 currencies since 1999
API description: Gets historical currency exchange rates for a given date and base currency.

date.description: The date for which to request the exchange rates, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to '2020-01-01'.

base.description: The base currency code for the exchange rates. Defaults to 'eur'.
